Step 2: Verified deal values and payment types from company investor relations announcements and press releases, categorizing as Cash, Stock, or Hybrid based on consideration structure

Step 3: Validated each transaction meets E&P industry classification (upstream exploration and production assets or corporate acquisitions), confirmed announcement dates fall within H2 2025, and verified deal values exceed USD 100 million threshold
